projects.name: Cricket World Cup Database
projects.description: Created a Cricket World Cup Database using SQL to store and manage information related to teams, players, matches, and statistics. Designed to support queries for match schedules, player perfor- mance, and team standings.

projects.name: Temperature Converter
projects.description: Developed a Temperature Converter using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to convert temper- atures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. The converter provides a user-friendly interface with real-time conversion updates, developing the front end.

Ex- plored AI applications such as disease prediction, medical image analysis, and personalized treat- ment planning. Discussed the impact of AI on improving patient outcomes, reducing healthcare costs, and addressing healthcare disparities.
